sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰國緝毒部隊的九名人員已被指控犯有謀殺罪。

sentences.english: Nearly 30,000 people have been killed since the campaign began.
sentences.chinese: 自從緝毒戰開始以來，已有近3萬人喪生。

sentences.english: Police said an informant led narcotics officers to the house.
sentences.chinese: 警方說是一名告密者把緝毒警察引領到此的。

sentences.english: Drug warriors have been very successful.
sentences.chinese: 緝毒戰士是非常成功的。

sentences.english: Those dogs don't go home with you.
sentences.chinese: 你不必把緝毒犬帶回家。

sentences.english: The more no one know relieved once was a anti-drug police.
sentences.chinese: 更沒有人知道安心曾經是一位緝毒警察。

sentences.english: Being a nark on the New York Police Force is a very dangerous job.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約警察局當一名緝毒偵探是很危險的職業。

sentences.english: Being a narc on the New York Police Force is a very dangerous job .
sentences.chinese: 在紐約警察局當一名緝毒偵探是很危險的職業。

sentences.english: The canines bathe before boarding planes and the inspection only takes 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 緝毒犬登機前要洗澡，查毒任務須在10分鐘內完成。

sentences.english: He also repeated a self "drug" major, leading to defraud the trust.
sentences.chinese: 他還多次自導自演“緝毒”大案，以騙取領導信任。

sentences.english: Shehad transferred to Homicide from Vice and Narcotics six months ago.
sentences.chinese: 她是六個月前剛從緝毒科調過來的。

sentences.english: Being a narc on the New York police force is a very dangerous job.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約的警察局當一名緝毒偵探是危險的職業。

sentences.english: Be a narc on the New York police force is a very dangerous job.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約警察局當一名緝毒偵探是很危險的職業。

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: (of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
public security authorities, acronym from 公安局[gong1 an1 ju2], 檢察院|检察院[jian3 cha2 yuan4] and 法院[fa3 yuan4]
